amendment.description: An amendment to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the `ENERGY STAR' or `Federal Energy Management Program' designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the House Report 110-201 to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the `ENERGY STAR' or `Federal Energy Management Program' designation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inglis (SC) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
